entry.title: ᴛʜᴇ 26ᴛʜ ʙᴀʟʟʏʜᴏᴜʀᴀ ᴡᴀʟᴋɪɴɢ ꜰᴇꜱᴛɪᴠᴀʟ ᴛᴀᴋᴇꜱ ᴘʟᴀᴄᴇ ꜰʀᴏᴍ 7ᴛʜ-9ᴛʜ ᴏᴄᴛᴏʙᴇʀ ɪɴ ᴋɪʟꜰɪɴᴀɴᴇ, ᴄᴏ. ʟɪᴍᴇʀɪᴄᴋ, ᴀɢᴀɪɴ ɪɴ ᴄᴏʟʟᴀʙᴏʀᴀᴛɪᴏɴ ᴡɪᴛʜ ᴛʜᴇ ᴊᴏʏᴄᴇ ʙʀᴏᴛʜᴇʀꜱ ᴍᴜꜱɪᴄ ꜰᴇꜱᴛɪᴠᴀʟ. ᴇꜱᴛᴀʙʟɪꜱʜᴇᴅ ᴀꜱ ɪʀᴇʟᴀɴᴅ’ꜱ ꜰɪʀꜱᴛ-ᴇᴠᴇʀ ᴡᴀʟᴋɪɴɢ ꜰᴇꜱᴛɪᴠᴀʟ ʙᴀᴄᴋ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴀʏ, ɪᴛ ᴘʀᴏᴠɪᴅᴇꜱ ᴀɴ ᴏᴘᴘᴏʀᴛᴜɴ

entry.title: Happy Monday everyone ✨ Wishing everyone an amazing week 😃 This is your Monday reminder to try and always get out from some fresh air and scenic views, it’s good for the soul ❤️

entry.title: Hop up on your bike to discover magnificent views of the Ballyhoura and Galtee Mountains from the road, as well as ancient sites preserved in an unspoilt landscape. For more information on road cycling routes in Ballyhoura you can download our App #VisitB

entry.title: And just like that it’s all over! Thank you so much to everyone that attended our Ballyhoura Walking Festival 2022, we hope you enjoyed the events as much as we did. It’s so amazing to see everyone come together to celebrate Ireland and everything it has
entry.content: And just like that it’s all over! Thank you so much to everyone that attended our Ballyhoura Walking Festival 2022, we hope you enjoyed the events as much as we did. It’s so amazing to see everyone come together to celebrate Ireland and everything it has

entry.title: Situated at the crossroads of Munster, on the borders of counties Tipperary, Limerick and Cork, Ballyhoura Country is an area of undulating green pastures, woodlands, hills and mountains. The ancient and unspoilt landscape, an abundance of significant her
entry.content: Situated at the crossroads of Munster, on the borders of counties Tipperary, Limerick and Cork, Ballyhoura Country is an area of undulating green pastures, woodlands, hills and mountains. The ancient and unspoilt landscape, an abundance of significant her

entry.title: What to do for spooky season 👻 the possibilities are endless! From pumpkin patches, wreath making & even mind reading 🔮 There is something for everyone this October in Ballyhoura! For a full list of events please head over to our website 👻

entry.title: 🥾Bernard Loop is a fantastic route. The initial climb on the trail uphill is steep but it’s a good warm-up. The route is a nice mixture of covered and open forest paths, gravel roads and grassy hills. The scenery is great, plenty of wildlife to see, look

entry.title: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and it’s one of the Ireland’s most popular hidden gems
